mapper.select: select * from employees where first_name LIKE #{a}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into employees(employee_id, last_name, first_name, hire_date, email, job_id) values(#{employee_id}, #{last_name}, #{first_name}, sysdate, #{email}, #{job_id})
mapper.select: select r, first_name, hire_date from (select rownum r, first_name , hire_date from (select * from employees order by hire_date desc)) where r>= #{array[0]} and r <=#{array[1]}
